two_factor_text1.message: Two-Factor Authentication significantly increases the security of your account. We highly recommend that you enable it.

two_factor_text2.message: Way to go! You care about your security as much as we do. Thank you for enabling Two-Factor Authentication!

two_factor_text_point1.message: Install an authenticator app on your mobile device. We suggest Google Authenticator.

two_factor_text_point2.message: Scan the QR code when prompted by your Authenticator.

two_factor_text_point3.message: In case your phone gets stolen or erased, you will need this code to link FALDAX with a new app.

two_factor_text_point4.message: Do not share the code with anyone. FALDAX will never ask you for this code.

illegal_popup_subtext1.message: Unfortunately, FALDAX does not offer trading services in your area at this time, but we are actively working to increase availability. Visit the world map on our home page to see where trading is considered legal in your area. If you are unable to trade that simply means we are working through the licensing process with the authorities in your area. Check back often or subscribe to our newsletter to be notified when services become available for you.

illegal_popup_subtext2.message: Thank you for your support and your patience.

panic_popup_subtext.message: Our systems have detected unwarranted and suspicious behavior which triggered our automatic lockout protocols. In order to ensure the safety and security of your assets and information, all assets system-wide are frozen and you will not be able to trade or move assets during this time. The balance you see in each of your wallets is secure and accurate. By default, the lockout goes into effect for 24 hours, but this time may vary depending upon what our security team finds and mitigates any known risks to you and all of our valued customers. Please follow our Twitter page and notifications we will send via text and email for the latest updates. Our primary concern is to always be the best possible stewards of your information and assets, and we are deeply sorry for any inconvenience. We thank you for your support and patience.

idcp_text_2.message: An ID confirmation photo (IDCP) is a photo of you, the account holder, holding your ID document and a handwritten note next to your face.

idcp_text_3.message: Below is a checklist for producing a proper IDCP that can be accepted by our verification team:

idcp_text_id_brief.message: The ID you're holding must be the same ID used for KYC verification. The details on the ID in the photo must be readable. They cannot be blurry or out of focus.

idcp_text_note_brief.message: The handwritten note must say "Only for trading digital currency on www.faldax.com" and must include the current date with your signature. Pay close attention when writing the handwritten note! If even one word is different in the note, the IDCP may not be accepted.

non_latin_characters_text.message: For documents in languages that use non-Latin characters (such as Russian, Chinese, Thai, Hebrew, etc.), a notarized translation of your proof of residence document will greatly speed up processing time.

required_to_provide_text.message: You will be required to provide an

for_the_intermediate_verification_text.message: for the Intermediate verification level if you are

german_bank_account_text.message: Funding with a German bank account

may_be_other_situations_text.message: However, there may also be other situations where we would require you to upload an ID confirmation photo.

photo_of_you_text.message: (IDCP) is a photo of you, the account holder, holding your

checklist_for_idcp_text.message: Below is a checklist for producing a proper IDCP that can be accepted by our verification team

id_holding_text.message: The ID you're holding must be the same ID used for KYC verification.

the_details_on_id_text.message: The details on the ID in the photo must be

cannot_be_blurry_text.message: They cannot be blurry or out of focus.

only_for_faldax_text.message: only for trading digital currency on www.faldax.com

pay_close_attention_text.message: Pay close attention when writing the handwritten note! If even one word is different in the note, the IDCP may not be accepted.

be_aware_text.message: Be aware that in certain situations we may request that you write something else on the handwritten note. Follow the instructions provided to you in your ticket closely.

write_note_text.message: Write the note with your hand.

write_note_exactly_text.message: Write the note exactly as instructed

change_wording_text.message: Don't change the wording or meaning of the note.

we_accept_note_text.message: We accept translations of the note in other languages as long as it keeps the same meaning.

how_to_put_together_text.message: How to put the ID and note together

high_quality_photo_text.message: Use a high-quality photo and make sure the text and numbers on the ID are readable. Your whole face and arms should also be visible.

not_cover_parts_text.message: Do not cover parts of the ID, message, or your face.

id_in_your_hands_text.message: You must be holding the ID in your hands; your hands and arms should be visible in the image. Do not wear sunglasses, hats, or anything that covers your facial features.

do_not_cover_text.message: Do not cover parts of the ID, message, or your face.

hold_the_id_text.message: Hold the ID and note in your hand(s)

someone_else_hold_text.message: Don't have someone else hold the note.

tap_id_text.message: Don't tape the ID to the note.

clearly_visible_text.message: The ID and the note all have to be clearly visible.

details_on_id_text.message: Don't cover any details on the ID or note with your fingers.

upload_instruct_text.message: You can upload your IDCP in your FALDAX account on the

idcp_on_that_page_text.message: If you do not see the section to upload the IDCP on that page

id_must_meet_requirement_text.message: In addition to the points above, US clients' IDs must meet the following requirements
